confirm.header:
If you unlock [color=title]Pickpocket[/color], you will lose access to the [color=title]Invisibility[/color] skill.
Higher levels of [color=title]Pickpocket[/color] increase the [color=title]effective range[/color] of the skill and allow you to pickpocket [color=title]NPCs[/color].

receipt.footer: You will no longer have access to the [color=title]Invisibility[/color] skill.

texts.overview: Having acquired the final upgrade to [color=title]Pickpocket[/color], you now have an [color=title]infinite[/color] pickpocket range. Also, the [color=title]Pickpocket[/color] skill now attempts to steal [color=title]gold or items[/color] from friendly people in [color=title]town areas[/color].
